DOC.brief_title: Prospective Aneurysm Trial : High Angle Aorfix™ Bifurcated Stent Graft
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed abdominal aortic aneurysm > 4.5 cm diameter , OR 4.0 cm large diameter symptomatic ( i.e . pain , embolization ) , OR document AAA growth 5 mm within previous 6 month , and/or include extension common iliac artery ( y ) , and/or Iliac aneurysm great , equal 3.5 cm maximum diameter .
